title: Type for photography books?
content:
Can any of you typophiles suggest some good typefaces for digital photography books (reference, handbook, creative)?

Also, if anyone has experience designing non-fiction, do you like to use more than one type family? Or, do you prefer the consistency, and simplicity, of using different weights and styles of the same font.

Thanks very much
author: _jimmy_

comments.content: Try developing layouts with both approaches, and see which you (or your client) prefer.
